files.README.md:
# 0xeb-tools Marketplace

Claude Code plugins for reverse engineering and binary analysis and general purpose utilities.

## Installation

```bash
# Add the marketplace (one-time)
/plugin marketplace add 0xeb/anthropic-marketplace

# Install idasql
/plugin install idasql@0xeb-tools
```

## Available Plugins

| Plugin | Description | Requires |
|--------|-------------|----------|
| idasql | Query IDA Pro databases via SQL | IDA Pro license, IDA install in the PATH, IDASDK env var |

## Usage

After installation, use the idasql agent:

```
"Using the idasql agent, count functions in myfile.i64"
"Using the idasql agent, decompile main in test.exe"
```

## Updates

```bash
/plugin marketplace update 0xeb-tools
/plugin update idasql@0xeb-tools
```

## More Tools Coming

- bnsql (Binary Ninja)
- pdbsql (PDB symbols)

plugins.name: idasql
plugins.description: SQL interface to IDA Pro databases - query functions, xrefs, decompile code
